successes.title: Kiwi 3 - OBD Car to Smartphone Interface Reinvented
successes.description:
Transform your smart phone, tablet, smart watch, or PC into an engine check diagnostic tool, trip computer, performance meter, and more
Miss our campaign?

Pledges.description: CONNECT -  Every dollar helps and we appreciate your support! Pledge $5 to be kept in the loop on exclusive project updates.
EARLY BIRD - Get one (1) Kiwi 3 OBD wireless hardware interface to smart phone, tablet, smart watch, and PC. Will retail for $119. Save $60. FREE Worldwide shipping.

ADVANTAGE - If you missed our early birds, it's not too late. We're offering this special for blasting past our goal. Get one (1) Kiwi 3 OBD wireless hardware interface to smart phone, tablet, smart watch, and PC. Will retail for $119. Save $50. FREE Worldwide shipping.
ACCELERATE - Get one (1) Kiwi 3 OBD wireless hardware interface to smart phone, tablet, smart watch, and PC. Will retail for $119. Save $40. FREE Worldwide shipping.

VIP - FIRST IN LINE to get one (1) Kiwi 3 OBD wireless hardware interface to smart phone, tablet, smart watch, and PC. VIP backers move to the front of the line to receive their reward (*except developer) before all other reward tiers. FREE Worldwide shipping.
BUDDY UP -  Get two (2) Kiwi 3 OBD wireless hardware interface to smart phone, tablet, smart watch, and PC. Save $120 from retail. FREE Worldwide shipping.

DEVELOPER - Get one Kiwi 3 developer unit (non production version) to get a head start on developing your app. Developers get free exposure in our exclusive marketing campaigns and one (1) free Kiwi 3 production unit when available.

DEVELOPER 2 - Get one Kiwi 3 developer unit (non production version) to get a head start on developing your app. Developers get free exposure in our exclusive marketing campaigns and one (1) free Kiwi 3 production unit when available.
GROUP BUY - Get five (5) Kiwi 3 OBD wireless hardware interface to smart phone, tablet, smart watch, and PC. Save $300 from retail. FREE Worldwide shipping.
RESELLER - Get ten (10) Kiwi 3 OBD wireless hardware interface to smart phone, tablet, smart watch, and PC. Save $600 from retail. FREE Worldwide shipping.
